pros: Enhanced durability; Exceptional plush cushioning; Ideal for winter runs; Ultra distance-ready; Surprisingly stable; Reliable grip; Good-quality materials
cons: Reduced breathability; Increased weight; Slight price bump
RR_verdict: Our experience with the ASICS Trabuco Max 3 reveals a careful update, preserving its plush midsole, high stack height, reliable grip, and wide upper. However, it's worth mentioning that the shoe now offers less ventilation, comes with a slight price hike, and carries a bit more weight. Despite these changes, it still stands out in the max-cushioned trail shoe category for its balanced performance and rockered ride, ready for long runs and any ultra distances.
awards: Top pick in best comfortable running shoes, Top pick in best ASICS trail running shoes
